columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Unique ID identifying the user across all data sources (PS. not every Trustpilot review has a user_id).

columns.name: createdtimestamp
columns.description: The moment the review was received by Trustpilot.

columns.name: stars
columns.description: Rating from the review (ranging from 1 to 5).

columns.name: text
columns.description: Feedback text written by the reviewer.

columns.name: is_review_verified
columns.description: True if the review was verified by Trustpilot.

table_description: Logs user onboarding events within the banking app

columns.name: event_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the onboarding event.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: ID of the user involved in the onboarding event.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the onboarding event occurred.

columns.name: button_type
columns.description: Type of button clicked during onboarding.

table_description: Monetary account information for digital bank users.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique ID for the monetary account.

columns.name: iban_country
columns.description: IBAN country code associated with the account.

table_description: Stock information for companies listed on the NYSE.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country where the company is based.

columns.name: is_etf
columns.description: True if this is an ETF.

columns.name: is_fund
columns.description: True if this is a fund.

columns.name: is_actively_trading
columns.description: True if the stock is currently actively traded.

table_description: Source and metadata about where users registered from.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the registration record.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source through which the user registered.

columns.name: app_os
columns.description: Operating system of the user's app.

table_description: User dimension table including age and status details.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type or category of the user.

columns.name: age
columns.description: User age calculated from date_of_birth and the current date.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the user account.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

columns.name: updated_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the user record was last updated.

table_description: Contains line items associated with invoices.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the invoice item.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.description: Identifier of the invoice this item belongs to.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: User associated with this invoice item.
